events.title: Ceremony
events.details: Join us for our intimate ceremony as we exchange vows surrounded by nature's beauty

events.title: Cocktail Hour
events.details: Celebrate with signature cocktails and hors d'oeuvres while we take photos

events.title: Reception
events.details: Dance the night away with dinner, toasts, and celebration until midnight

additionalInfo.title: Dress Code
additionalInfo.details: We suggest cocktail attire in soft, romantic colors. Please avoid white and ivory.

additionalInfo.title: Weather
additionalInfo.details: Perfect weather expected! Light jacket recommended for evening.

additionalInfo.title: Parking
additionalInfo.details: Free valet parking available. Additional street parking nearby.

additionalInfo.title: Accommodations
additionalInfo.details: Special rates at nearby hotels. See our Guest Hub for details.

loveStoryChapters.title: How We Met
loveStoryChapters.subtitle: A Serendipitous Beginning
loveStoryChapters.description: Sometimes the best things happen when you least expect them. Our story began with a simple smile and a spilled coffee.

loveStoryChapters.title: The Proposal
loveStoryChapters.subtitle: A Moment of Forever
loveStoryChapters.description: Under the same stars where we shared our first kiss, Alexander asked the question that would change our lives forever.

loveStoryChapters.title: Our Journey
loveStoryChapters.subtitle: Building Dreams Together
loveStoryChapters.description: From late-night conversations to Sunday morning pancakes, every moment has been a step toward our beautiful future.
